title: Qt5: No menu shortcuts are working

content.raw:
Keyboard shortcuts which show up on the top toolbar, such as rotate/translate/scale, undo, snap and plotting are working.

But shortcuts which only show up on the top menu, such as opening the building/model editor, opening the topic viewer, saving the world, closing the editors, etc, are not working. The shortcuts don't even show on the menu like they used to:

![missingshortkeys.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3886171717-missingshortkeys.png)
content.html:
Keyboard shortcuts which show up on the top toolbar, such as rotate/translate/scale, undo, snap and plotting are working.

But shortcuts which only show up on the top menu, such as opening the building/model editor, opening the topic viewer, saving the world, closing the editors, etc, are not working. The shortcuts don't even show on the menu like they used to:
